gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 104, Hornets 87
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Hornets, 104-87. Bam Adebayo led the Heat with 24 points, 10 rebounds, and seven assists as Tyler Herro (21 points, seven rebounds, four assists) and Duncan Robinson (19 points, four rebounds, five assists) added 40 points. Terry Rozier led Charlotte with 26 points and seven assists as LaMelo Ball added 21 points, 10 rebounds, and five assists. Miami improves to 23-16 as the Hornets move to 8-29.
